contents.content: 第三节 拓展练习10题
In observed lessons, any strugglers would be assisted by the teacher or quietly seek help from their neighbour.

contents.title: 一方面，还不清楚大量的男性和女性是如何被运到爱尔兰以形成一个可以存在下去的人群的。

contents.content: According to the latest estimates, if nothing is done to reverse the traffic growth trend, CO2 emissions from transport can be expected to increase by around 50% to 1,113 billion tonnes by 2020, compared with the 739 billion tonnes recorded in 1990.
This was done by transfers without replacing the persons who left; no one was to be dismissed.
A development of 194 houses which would take up 14 hectares of land above ground would occupy 2.7 hectares below it, while the number of roads would be halved.
This change is no more evident than in Western society today, when notions of health and health promotion are being challenged and expanded in new ways.
Sea ports have been transformed by the advent of powered vessels, whose size and draught have increased.

The study reported here was conducted in the Prince William Hospital in Brisbane, Australia, where, prior to this time, few active steps had been taken to measure, understand or manage the occurrence of absenteeism.

Although small-scale business training and credit programs have become more common throughout the world in the 1990s, relatively little attention has been paid to the need to direct such opportunities to young people.
But Byers points out that the benefits of increased exercise disappear rapidly after training stops, so many improvement in endurance resulting from juvenile play would be lost by adulthood.
For one thing, it's not clear just how sufficient numbers of men and women could have been transported to Ireland to establish a viable population.
语法破解：这是一个简单句，would be assisted和seek help是并列的谓语，would be assisted是被动语态的一般过去将来时。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。if引导的是条件状语从句，is done是被动语态的一般现在时；主句中的can be expected是情态动词后加被动式。
语法破解：分号前是一个主从复合句，主句中的was done是被动语态的一般过去时；who引导的是定语从句，修饰the persons。分号后是一个简单句，was to be dismissed是被动语态的一般过去将来时。
语法破解：while前是一个主从复合句，which引导的是定语从句，修饰194 houses。while后是一个简单句，would be halved是被动语态的一般过去将来时。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。when引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰today，该从句中的are being challenged and expanded是被动语态的现在进行时。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的have been transformed是被动语态的现在完成时；whose引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰powered vessels。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的was conducted是被动语态的一般过去时；where引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰the Prince William Hospital，该从句中的had been taken是被动语态的过去完成时。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。Although引导的是让步状语从句，主句中的的has been paid是被动语态的现在完成时。
语法破解：so前面是一个多重主从复合句，that引导的是宾语从句，该宾语从句中又包含一个由after引导的时间状语从句。so后面是一个简单句，would be lost是被动语态的一般过去将来时。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。it是形式主语；how引导的是主语从句，该从句中的could have been transported是情态动词后加被动式。
